original_text: After some time, King Xerxes gave one of his officers greater authority. The officer's name was Haman. He was the son of Hammedatha, a descendant of Agag. Haman became the most important officer who served the king.
korean_text: 그 후에 아하수에로 왕이 아각 사람 함므다다의 아들 하만의 지위를 높이 올려 함께 있는 모든 대신 위에 두니

sentences.original_text: King Xerxes gave one of his officers greater authority
sentences.korean_translation: 크셀크세스 왕은 자신의 관리 중 한 명에게 더 큰 권위를 주었고

sentences.original_text: He was the son of Hammedatha
Haman became the most important officer
